column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My girlfriend and I ended up getting the bone marrow and chop salad to start.  The bone marrow was served with a really good sourdough and onion jam.  The chopped salad has the famous bacon and a really good dressing.  For dinner
column2: we shared the dry aged bone in ribeye
column3: the highlight of the night.  Tons of flavor
column7: and brussel sprouts.  All really good
column8: but nothing that you need to get.
